pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Usagesimple_json_flatten_py is a Python library for flattening complex JSONsFrom```JSON{"a": [ {"b":37},{"c":64}],"g": 26}```To```{ "a_b":37, "a_c":64, "g":26}``````Pythonfrom simple_flatten_json_py import simple_flatten_json# Sample JSON datadata={ "cat":[ { "fish":"tuna" }, { "chicken":3 }, { "medicine":{ "pills":5 } } ]}# returns a flattened json # {"cat_0_fish": "tuna", "cat_1_chicken": 3,"cat_2_medicine_pills": 20}print(simple_flatten_json.flatten_json(data))```
